snippet: Much is riding on the unscripted big power talks beginning Friday between President Obama and President Xi Jinping of China.
abstract: Editorial contends upcoming summit meeting between Pres Obama and Chinese Pres Xi Jinping is important opportunity for them to chart smoother path and avoid destructive conflicts that have historically afflicted relations between two countries; outlines items that meeting's agenda should include.
lead_paragraph: Much is riding on the unscripted big power talks beginning Friday between President Obama and President Xi Jinping of China.

headline.seo: President Obama Meets President Xi Jinping
